education_text.0: Paul Compton (born 1944) is an Emeritus Professor at the      University of New South Wales University of New South Wales (UNSW)Paul Compton (born 1944) is an Emeritus Professor at the      University of New South Wales University of New South Wales (UNSW)Paul Compton worked at the      Garvan Institute of Medical Research Garvan Institute before his appointment at UNSW
